base_description: Round wall clock with abstract design.
part_description: Clock face is circular with abstract patterns, featuring three ornate black hands at the center. The clock has a white, textured frame surrounding the face.
internal_interaction_description: The three hands—hour, minute, and second—are centrally mounted and rotate around the clock face, each moving at different speeds to indicate time. The ornate design of the hands adds a decorative element, while their contrasting color ensures visibility against the patterned background.
external_interaction_description: The clock is designed to be wall-mounted, interacting with its environment by providing timekeeping functionality. Its abstract design can complement various interior styles, and its visibility allows it to be easily read from a distance by people in the room.
